verbose_text: Ritonavir is a very potent inhibitor of CYP3A4 (Ki 0.59 +/- 0.12muM), and may slow the metabolism of drugs which are substrates of CYP3A4, leading to potential dangerous drug-drug interactions [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Ritonavir is a very potent inhibitor of CYP3A4 (Ki 0.59 +/- 0.12muM), and may slow the metabolism
